Factsheet

Developer:
Dev 2 Team
Based in Washington, DC
Release date:
31 Oct, 2017
Platforms:
PC / Mac
Website:
www.kirbycofino.com
Regular Price:
FREE

Description

The game takes place during a scavenger hunt in your home. You will collect presents and solve puzzles. You WILL have fun.

History

Spinal Muscular Atrophy is a condition which affects 1 person in ever 6-10,000 people. With this condition, life is difficult but not impossible, and we made a game to reflect that.

Features

  • Switch back and forth between an adult and child, using their strengths to solve puzzles.
  • Collect presents.
  • Learn about SMA.
